snippet: Price, along with distinct features like size and layout, can hinder transactions for the top floors of office buildings in Manhattan.
abstract: Price, along with distinct features like size and layout, can hinder transactions for the penthouse floors of office buildings in Manhattan; brokers, landlords and industry analysts say that more than a half-dozen penthouses are now available in premier Midtown buildings, more than in recent memory, with many having been empty for more than a year.
lead_paragraph: Price, along with distinct features like size and layout, can hinder transactions for the top floors of office buildings in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Office Penthouses Leasing Slowly in Midtown
headline.main: Penthouse Offices Leasing Slowly in Midtown
headline.print_headline: Penthouse Offices Leasing Slowly in Midtown
